Message:
...Executioner has
but one purpose—
to strike down tyrants.

As Ophelia and I stood
at the throne, I proclaimed to her.

“I have no doubt that I will one day
descend down the path of tyranny,
as my royal brethren did before me.

When that time comes, Ophelia,
I want you to swear to me...
You will take Executioner...and kill me.”

...I know Ophelia.
While full of kindness and loyalty,
she possesses a fragile heart—

one that will surely be crushed
by the sheer weight of this promise.

After staining that sword
with my blood,
Ophelia would certainly
turn it upon herself and pierce
right through her own heart.

...I know this is the tragedy
that awaits, and yet...

I am too weak to convey
what my heart truly desires—
for Ophelia to die together with me.

Pathetic...
I am nothing but a coward.
